Html:
Ive got an quite large application with lots of different modules and the startup time is long.

Most of these modules are not used at startup and some are not used at the same time.

Is there any way to have CAL load the modules async?

I would like to have the "startup modules" loaded as fast as possible and then have the rest loaded in the background or on demand.

Some advice on this?

Hi ronag89

In prism you can load the modules you want on demand.Check in the Prism documentation and you will find some example loading module on demand.

Thanks
